body:
The existing HttpHook already supports https if you provide it a schema in the connection. Is there something stopping you using that?

I do not think a whole extra class is useful, especially not a class that duplicates the entirety of HttpHook with only minor changes and no tests.
@ashb thanks for pointing it out.
